com.heroiclabs.nakama

Interface Notification


  • public interface Notification
    Represents a notification aimed at a particular user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getCode() 
      java.lang.String getContent() 
      long getCreatedAt() 
      long getExpiresAt() 
      java.lang.String getId() 
      java.lang.String getSenderId() 
      java.lang.String getSubject() 
      boolean isPersistent() 

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Returns:
        The unique ID of the notification.

      • getSubject

        java.lang.String getSubject()
        Returns:
        The subject text.

      • getContent

        java.lang.String getContent()
        Returns:
        The notification body.

      • getCode

        long getCode()
        Returns:
        The notification code.

      • getSenderId

        java.lang.String getSenderId()
        Returns:
        The user ID of the sender, or an empty string if it's a system notification.

      • getCreatedAt

        long getCreatedAt()
        Returns:
        The UTC milliseconds timestamp when the notification was created.

      • getExpiresAt

        long getExpiresAt()
        Returns:
        The UTC milliseconds timestamp when the notification expires.

      • isPersistent

        boolean isPersistent()
        Returns:
        true if the notification was persisted and may be retrieved later, false if the notification was only delivered and not stored.
